champion_aurelionsol.description: Displayed name for champion Aurelion Sol.

champion_drmundo.description: Displayed name for champion Dr. Mundo.

champion_jarvaniv.description: Displayed name for champion Jarvan IV.

champion_leesin.description: Displayed name for champion Lee Sin.

champion_masteryi.description: Displayed name for champion Master Yi.

champion_missfortune.description: Displayed name for champion Miss Fortune.

champion_nunu.description: Displayed name for champion Nunu & Willump.

champion_tahmkench.description: Displayed name for champion Tahm Kench.

champion_twistedfate.description: Displayed name for champion Twisted Fate.

champion_xinzhao.description: Displayed name for champion Xin Zhao.

region_bandle_city.description: Displayed name for region Bandle City.

region_mount_targon.description: Displayed name for region Mt. Targon.

region_shadow_isles.description: Displayed name for region Shadow Isles.

info_title_short.description: Short version of the title - preferably the abbreviation of the title.

info_title_version.description: The title of this extension with a version string added. Specify $version$ where the version should go.

info_description.message: Enhances your League Universe page by adding some functionality.

info_open.description: The link in Riot's sidebar to open the extension.

info_subtitle_by.description: Variations of the first part of the subtitle, 'by Author'. Include a trailing whitespace. Please check a story on universe to see if it matches!

info_universecode.description: All lowercase language-code. Always include the region even if translating for languages only. Ex: de -> de_de

popup_text.message: Visit the Universe and use one of the following to show the extension page:
popup_text.description: Displayed in the popup. HTML Encouraged, change the link href to your universe page but nothing else. (pls don't break it)

popup_change.description: Displayed in the popup after the shortcut and in brackets like '(change this)'

popup_contextmenu.description: Displayed in the popup. How to open the extension.

popup_riotmenu.description: Displayed in the popup. Another way to open the extension.

popup_click.description: Displayed in the popup. Last way to open the extension.

popup_close.message: Right click on this icon to hide it!
popup_close.description: Displayed in the popup. How to hide the icon.

heading_stories.description: Tab name, displayed in the heading of the extension page.

heading_lists.description: Tab name, displayed in the heading of the extension page.

heading_options.description: Tab name, displayed in the heading of the extension page.

heading_about.description: Tab name, displayed in the heading of the extension page.

stories_text.message:
This is still a test version!

Filtering and Sorting should work, but it's not polished yet. Lists will come later.
    Notes:
  • I can't guarantee any data presented here is accurate. Pls don't sue me.
  • Regions are based on the champions from the story, not on the place the story takes place.
  • I added tags for some stories, but not all of them.
stories_text.description: Text displayed on the 'Stories' tab. HTML encouraged.

stories_filter_title.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the story title.

stories_placeholder_title.description: Placeholder for the title search field.

stories_filter_champions.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the champions in a story.

stories_placeholder_champions.description: Placeholder for the champions search field. Should be comma-separated and end with ... or equivalent.

stories_filter_regions.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the region where champions are from.

stories_placeholder_regions.description: Placeholder for the regions dropdown list. Should indicate no filtering / a standard value.

stories_filter_authors.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the author(s) of a story.

stories_placeholder_authors.description: Placeholder for the authors dropdown list. Should indicate no filtering / a standard value.

stories_filter_type.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the type (color story/other) and universe (main universe/AU).

stories_dropdown_alluniverses.description: Dropdown entry for the story type. Should indicate no filtering / a standard value.

stories_dropdown_mainuniverse.description: Dropdown entry for the story type. Only stories from the main canon universe.

stories_dropdown_alternateuniverses.description: Dropdown entry for the story type. Only stories from alternate universes.

stories_dropdown_allstories.description: Dropdown entry for the story type. Should indicate no filtering / a standard value.

stories_dropdown_colorstories.description: Dropdown entry for the story type. Only display color stories (Check the lore updates if you are unsure of the translation).

stories_dropdown_longstories.description: Dropdown entry for the story type. All stories that are not color stories.

stories_filter_words.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the length of a story.

stories_filter_words_text.description: Text that specifies the filter. Use $min$ and $max$ to specify where the number fields go.

min.example: 1000 - An input field for the minimum number of words.

max.example: 5000 - An input field for the maximum number of words.

stories_filter_date.description: Checkbox for enabling a filter. Filters by the date a story was released.

stories_filter_date_text.message: Must have been released after $min$ , but before $max$ .
stories_filter_date_text.description: Text that specifies the filter. Use $min$ and $max$ to specify where the date fields go.

min.example: 2016-06-01 - An input field for the first date.

max.example: 2017-01-01 - An input field for the second date.

stories_button_apply.description: Button label. Preferrably one word only.

stories_button_save.description: Button label. Preferrably one word only.

stories_button_reset.description: Button label. Preferrably one word only.

stories_button_reload.description: Button label. Preferrably one word only.

stories_table_nr.description: Table column heading. Short word or symbol, indicates the number of the story.

stories_table_title.description: Table column heading. Title of the stories in the table below.

stories_table_length.description: Table column heading. Length of the stories in the table below.

stories_table_champions.description: Table column heading. Champions of the stories in the table below.

stories_table_regions.description: Table column heading. Regions of the stories in the table below.

stories_table_author.description: Table column heading. Author of the stories in the table below, singular form if possible

stories_table_date.description: Table column heading. Release Date of the stories in the table below.

options_universelocale.message: Select the language you want to use Universe in:
options_universelocale.description: Displayed on the options tab. Describes a dropdown menu with language codes.

options_heightFactor.description: Describes the input for frame height as percentage of screen height.

options_heightConst.description: Describes the input for frame height as constant number of pixels.

options_calculatedHeight.description: Describes the output for the total calculated height.

options_widthFactor.description: Describes the input for frame width as percentage of screen width.

options_widthConst.description: Describes the input for frame width as constant number of pixels.

options_calculatedWidth.description: Describes the output for the total calculated width.

options_positionLeft.description: Describes the input for the left margin of the window.

options_positionTop.description: Describes the input for the upper margin of the window.

options_currentPosition.description: Describes the output for the window position (top/left).

options_contextmenu.description: Describes a checkbox that enables the context menu.

options_contextMenu_text.message: This enables the "Extract Image" functionality as well as other shortcuts.
options_contextMenu_text.description: Describes extra functionality added by the checkbox.

options_refresh_text.message: Changes to the window size and position are only applied after the page has been refreshed.
options_refresh_text.description: Warning that the user needs to refresh the page before changes take effect.

options_confirm.description: Button label, save/confirm the current values.

options_refresh.description: Button label, refresh the page so the current vaules are applied.

options_delete.description: Button label, deletes all user data (with another confirmation step).

options_delete_text.message: Type "delete" to delete all of your user data. This can not be reversed.
options_delete_text.description: Describes a text field that acts as last confirmation.

options_delete_confirmation.description: Describes the text that needs to be typed.

options_delete_alert.description: Text that's shown as a popup after the data is deleted.

about_legal.message: The Universe Enhancement Kit was created under Riot Games' 'Legal Jibber Jabber' policy using assets owned by Riot Games. Riot Games does not endorse or sponsor this project.
about_legal.description: Text displayed on the About tab. HTML Encouraged. Swap out the link to include your regions page.
